document.full_text: an ivorian leader who refuses to accept his electoral and military defeat insists that he does not want to die, even as a film about hitler's final days in his bunker fills the airwaves.
document.title: the lede: 'i am not a kamikaze,' gbagbo says from his bunker
lines_and_colors: an ivorian leader who refuses to accept his electoral and military defeat insists that he does not want to die, even as a film about hitler's final days in his bunker fills the airwaves.
